Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Directs the commissioner of corrections and community supervision to study gender disparity in resources provided to incarcerated individuals
Summary: Directs the commissioner of corrections and community supervision to study gender disparity in resources provided to incarcerated individuals and make a report to the governor and the legislature of the findings, conclusions and recommendations.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of corrections and community supervision to study gender disparity in resources provided to incarcerated individuals
